original_text: And when it was told King Solomon, “Joab has fled to the tent of the Lord, and behold, he is beside the altar,” Solomon sent Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, saying, “Go, strike him down.”
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 솔로몬 왕에게 아뢰되 요압이 여호와의 장막으로 도망하여 제단 곁에 있나이다 솔로몬이 여호야다의 아들 브나야를 보내며 이르되 너는 가서 그를 치라

sentences.original_text: And when it was told King Solomon
Joab has fled to the tent of the Lord
and behold, he is beside the altar
Solomon sent Benaiah the son of Jehoiada
